Speaking of traps I'm working on becoming a permanent trap, but in order to do so I have to get rid of my body hair using a IPL (hair removal laser gun) and like I said the other day this shit fucking hurts.

I'm taking a break from working on my voice and handwritting cause that can wait and with the IPL I don't feel like working on anything else towards becoming a permanent trap that day cause by the time I'm done I'm going "ow!  ow!  ow!"

The main obstacles for me permanently trapping are my body hair, voice and hand writting but other than that I can easily pass.
